languages.text: "Да хранит вас Великий, о шерин! Во всем Просторе не сыскать партнера надежнее!" {n}Джай на секунду задумывается, а затем ослепительно улыбается.{/n} "Дружба — дар Великого, и нам должно ее беречь!"

traits.locale_text: "Да хранит вас Великий, о шерин! Во всем Коронусе не сыскать партнера надежнее!" {n}Джай на секунду задумывается, а затем ослепительно улыбается.{/n} "Знаете что? Дружба — дар Великого, и нам должно ее беречь!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"
languages.original_text: "Да хранит вас Великий, о шерин! Во всем Просторе не сыскать партнера надежнее!" {n}Джай на секунду задумывается, а затем ослепительно улыбается.{/n} "Дружба — дар Великого, и нам должно ее беречь!"

traits.locale_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “愿至高无上的神皇保佑你，亲爱的！恐怕整个科罗努斯扩区都找不到比你更好的商业合作伙伴了！”{n}婕伊沉思了片刻，随后对你露出了耀眼的笑容。{/n}“友谊是至高无上的神皇赐予我们的礼物，我们必须珍惜！”
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"

traits.locale_text: “愿至高无上的神皇保佑你，亲爱的！恐怕整个科罗努斯扩区都找不到比你更好的商业合作伙伴了！”{n}婕伊沉思了片刻，随后对你露出了耀眼的笑容。{/n}“友谊是至高无上的神皇赐予我们的礼物，我们必须珍惜！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Que el Exaltado le bendiga, shereen! ¡No podría haber encontrado un{mf||a} mejor soci{mf|o|a} en toda la Extensión!». {n}Jae piensa durante un momento antes de regalarte una sonrisa brillante.{/n} «¡La amistad es un don del Exaltado y debemos celebrarlo!».
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Exaltado le bendiga, shereen! ¡No podría haber encontrado un{mf||a} mejor soci{mf|o|a} en toda la Extensión!». {n}Jae piensa durante un momento antes de regalarte una sonrisa brillante.{/n} «¡La amistad es un don del Exaltado y debemos celebrarlo!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンの加護があるみたいね、シャリーン！エクスパンス中を探しても、こんなに良いビジネスパートナーは見つからないわ！」{n}ジェイは少し考えてから、燦々と輝く笑顔を向けてくる。{/n}「友情はエグザルテッド・ワンからの贈り物よ。大事にしなくっちゃ！」
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンの加護があるみたいね、シャリーン！エクスパンス中を探しても、こんなに良いビジネスパートナーは見つからないわ！」{n}ジェイは少し考えてから、燦々と輝く笑顔を向けてくる。{/n}「友情はエグザルテッド・ワンからの贈り物よ。大事にしなくっちゃ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « L'Exalté vous bénisse, shereen ! Je n'aurais pas pu trouver {mf|meilleur|meilleure} partenaire dans toutes les Étendues ! » {n}Jae réfléchit quelques instants avant de vous gratifier de son plus beau sourire.{/n} « L'amitié est un don de l'Exalté qu'il nous faut chérir ! »
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Exalté vous bénisse, shereen ! Je n'aurais pas pu trouver {mf|meilleur|meilleure} partenaire dans toutes les Étendues ! » {n}Jae réfléchit quelques instants avant de vous gratifier de son plus beau sourire.{/n} « L'amitié est un don de l'Exalté qu'il nous faut chérir ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Der Erhabene segne Euch, Shereen! Ich könnte in der gesamten Ausdehnung {mf|keinen besseren Geschäftspartner|keine bessere Geschäftspartnerin} finden!" {n}Jae denkt kurz nach und lächelt dich dann strahlend an.{/n} "Freundschaft ist ein Geschenk des Erhabenen, das wir würdigen müssen!"
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Erhabene segne Euch, Shereen! Ich könnte in der gesamten Ausdehnung {mf|keinen besseren Geschäftspartner|keine bessere Geschäftspartnerin} finden!" {n}Jae denkt kurz nach und lächelt dich dann strahlend an.{/n} "Freundschaft ist ein Geschenk des Erhabenen, das wir würdigen müssen!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Görkemli iyiliğini versin şirinim! Koca Enginlik'te senden iyi bir iş ortağını arasam bulamam!" {n}Jae, bir an düşüncelere dalıyor, ardından da gözleri kamaşmış hâlde sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "Arkadaşlık, Görkemli'nin bize armağanıdır; kıymetini bilmek gerekir!"
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you, shereen! I couldn't find a better business partner in all the Expanse!" {n}Jae ponders for a moment, and then graces you with a dazzling smile.{/n} "Friendship is a gift from the Exalted One, and we must cherish it!"

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli iyiliğini versin şirinim! Koca Enginlik'te senden iyi bir iş ortağını arasam bulamam!" {n}Jae, bir an düşüncelere dalıyor, ardından da sana göz kamaştırıcı bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Arkadaşlık, Görkemli'nin bize armağanıdır; kıymetini bilmek gerekir!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
